changeSet.sql: UPDATE stretchy_report SET report_sql = "select sat.transaction_date as 'Fecha depósito', sa.client_id as 'Clienta', concat(c.firstname,' ', c.lastname) as 'Clienta Nombre', ifnull(g.id, 'N/A') as 'Código de grupo', ifnull(g.display_name, 'N/A') as 'Grupo',a.name as 'Agencia', case when releaseTbl.id is not null then 'Liberada' WHEN releaseTbl.id is null then 'En Reserva' end as Estado, releaseTbl.transaction_date as 'Fecha de Liberación', sa.account_balance_derived as 'Cambiar a Saldo', ifnull(creditTbl.loanCount, 0) as 'Créditos vigentes' from m_savings_account_transaction sat join m_savings_account sa on sa.id = sat.savings_account_id left join m_client c on c.id = sa.client_id LEFT JOIN m_group_client mgc ON mgc.client_id = c.id left join m_group g on g.id = mgc.group_id left join m_group center ON center.id = g.parent_id left join m_portfolio mp ON mp.id = center.portfolio_id left join m_supervision ms ON ms.id = mp.supervision_id left join m_agency a ON a.id = ms.agency_id left join (select sat.id, sat.loan_id, sat.transaction_date from m_savings_account_transaction sat where sat.transaction_type_enum = 20 and sat.loan_id is not null and sat.release_id_of_hold_amount is not null) as releaseTbl on releaseTbl.loan_id = sat.loan_id left join (select count(l.id) as loanCount, c.id as clientId, g.id as groupId from m_loan l left join m_client c on c.id = l.client_id left join m_group g on g.id = l.group_id where l.loan_status_id = 300 group by c.id, g.id) as creditTbl on creditTbl.clientId = c.id or creditTbl.groupId = g.id where sat.loan_id is not null and sat.transaction_type_enum = 1 and sat.transaction_date <= '${depositDate}'" WHERE report_name = "Reporte de Garantias vinculado a Prestamos";

changeSet.author: fineract
changeSet.sql: UPDATE stretchy_report SET report_sql = "SELECT ml.id AS 'ID de préstamo', ma.name AS Agencia, concat(faci.firstname, ' ', faci.lastname) AS 'Nombre facilitador', center.display_name AS 'Centro', mg.display_name AS 'Nombre de Grupo', mg.id AS 'Grupo No.', ml.account_no AS 'Código de Préstamo', mc.display_name AS 'Nombre del Cliente', mg.group_location AS 'Directión', mg.legacy_number AS 'No. de Celular', mlrs.duedate AS 'Próxima Fecha de Pago', ml.maturedon_date AS 'Fecha de Vencimiento', laa.total_overdue_derived AS 'Capital Pendiente' FROM m_office mo INNER JOIN m_office ounder ON ounder.hierarchy LIKE CONCAT(mo.hierarchy, '%') INNER JOIN m_client mc ON mc.office_id = ounder.id INNER JOIN m_loan ml ON ml.client_id = mc.id INNER JOIN m_loan_arrears_aging laa ON laa.loan_id = ml.id LEFT JOIN m_group_client mgc ON mgc.client_id = mc.id LEFT JOIN m_group mg ON mg.id = mgc.group_id LEFT JOIN m_group center ON center.id = mg.parent_id LEFT JOIN m_staff lo ON lo.id = ml.loan_officer_id LEFT JOIN m_guarantor gua ON gua.loan_id = ml.id LEFT JOIN m_portfolio mp ON mp.id = center.portfolio_id LEFT JOIN m_supervision ms ON ms.id = mp.supervision_id LEFT JOIN m_agency ma ON ma.id = ms.agency_id LEFT JOIN m_appuser faci ON faci.id = ma.responsible_user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT sc.loan_id AS loan_id, sc.duedate AS duedate FROM m_loan_repayment_schedule sc WHERE sc.completed_derived = FALSE ORDER BY sc.duedate ASC ) mlrs ON mlrs.loan_id = ml.id WHERE mo.id = '${officeId}' AND (ml.product_id = '${productId}' or '-1' = '${productId}') AND (ml.group_id = '${groupId}' or '-1' = '${groupId}') AND (ml.disbursedon_date BETWEEN '${disbursedOnStartDate}' AND '${disbursedOnEndDate}') AND ml.loan_status_id = 300 GROUP BY ml.id" WHERE report_name = "Group Loans in Arrears";
